dmca.title: NOTICE OF COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT Pmalbum.com (67.19.242.2)
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Cherkashina, Tatyana [mailto:TCherkashina@playboy.com] 
Posted At: Friday, September 01, 2006 9:31 AM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: NOTICE OF COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT Pmalbum.com (67.19.242.2)
Subject: NOTICE OF COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT Pmalbum.com (67.19.242.2)
Importance: High


September 1, 2006
 
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. 
1333 North Stemmons Freeway
Suite 110
Dallas, TX 75207
US

 

Legal-response@theplanet.com

legalresponse@theplanet.com

 

Dear Sir or Madam:

It has been brought to our attention that web pages at Pmalbum.com
(67.19.242.2) display, without authorization, reproductions of images
owned by Playboy Enterprises International, Inc. ("Playboy"). All right,
title and interest in and to these images belongs to Playboy.

I believe in good faith that the disputed images displayed on
Pmalbum.com (67.19.242.2) are not authorized by the copyright owner, its
agent or the law.

Accordingly, please remove the unauthorized reproductions of Playboy
copyrighted images on Pmalbum.com (67.19.242.2) and on all web pages
under your control. 

Examples of the copyrighted material can be found at the following
links:

http://www.pmalbum.com/

This link displays Playboy's copyrighted content including but not
limited to the following models:

Castle, Madeline <javascript:pbModel(1,10)> 

Cameron, Barbara <javascript:pbModel(2,10)>  

Callahan, Marlene <javascript:pbModel(4,11)>  

Corday, Mara And Sheehan <javascript:pbModel(5,10)>  

Crawford, Nancy <javascript:pbModel(6,4)>

Crews, Tonya <javascript:pbModel(8,3)>

Collins, Jo <javascript:pbModel(11,12)> 

Collier, Gay <javascript:pbModel(12,7)> 

Conway, Karla <javascript:pbModel(13,4)>

Christian, Kaya <javascript:pbModel(14,11)>

Collinson, Mary And Madeleine <javascript:pbModel(17,10)>  

Cranston, Chris <javascript:pbModel(18,4)>

Cole, Marilyn <javascript:pbModel(19,1)> 

Coleman, Phyllis <javascript:pbModel(20,8)> 

Cameron, Nancy <javascript:pbModel(21,1)>  

Cordet, Ester <javascript:pbModel(21,10)> 

Cunningham, Victoria <javascript:pbModel(22,4)>  

Cox, Ashley <javascript:pbModel(24,12)> 

Cleveland, Missy <javascript:pbModel(26,4)>  

Collins, Candace <javascript:pbModel(26,12)>  

Cagle, Sandy <javascript:pbModel(27,2)> 

Cooke, Victoria <javascript:pbModel(27,8)> 

Chin, Lonny <javascript:pbModel(30,1)> 

Carlton, Hope Marie <javascript:pbModel(32,7)> 

Carr, Laurie <javascript:pbModel(33,12)> 

Clark, Anna <javascript:pbModel(34,4)>  

Conrad, Kimberley <javascript:pbModel(35,1)>  

Cable, Tawni <javascript:pbModel(36,6)> 

Clarke, Julie <javascript:pbModel(38,3)> 

Christensen, Tonja <javascript:pbModel(38,11)> 

Cantrell, Cady <javascript:pbModel(39,4)>  

Corwin, Morena <javascript:pbModel(39,9)> 

Cialini, Julie Lynn <javascript:pbModel(41,2)> 

Carter, Elan <javascript:pbModel(41,6)> 

Checa, Maria <javascript:pbModel(41,8)>  

Carmack, Kona <javascript:pbModel(43,2)>  

Chanz, Nadine <javascript:pbModel(43,10)> 

Cover, Laura Lee <javascript:pbModel(45,10)> 

Cousino, Tishara <javascript:pbModel(46,5)>  

Cline, Kristi <javascript:pbModel(46,9)> 

Croft, Nichole Van <javascript:pbModel(47,10)>  

Carolin, Heather <javascript:pbModel(49,4)> 

Campisi, Amber <javascript:pbModel(52,2)>  

Culkin, Courtney Rachel <javascript:pbModel(52,4)> 

Chase, Qiana <javascript:pbModel(52,7)>  

 

Please be advised that this is only a small sampling of the infringing
material that is displayed on this website. The website has a statement
that it contains more than 1480 models and celebrities and more than
21600 pictures. The fact that the website claims to be "Super Magazine's
Collection, the largest collection on the NET including rare unpublished
photos and videos" is unacceptable as it refers to PLAYBOY magazine.
Additionally, most of the images have Playboy's trademarks (ie. PLAYBOY,
PLAYMATE, MISS [MONTH], CENTERFOLD and CYBER GIRL) displayed. We believe
there is a way for you to identify postings that are likely an
infringement and have them removed. We would be interested in working
with you in an effort to decrease the amount of infringing Playboy
material on this website. Please contact me at the number or email below
if you would be willing to discuss this issue.

 

I, Tatyana Cherkashina, under penalty of perjury, am authorized to act
on behalf of Playboy Enterprises International, Inc. in regard to the
above-mentioned unauthorized reproduction of the Playboy copyrighted
images. My contact information is as follows: Playboy Enterprises
International, Inc., 680 N. Lake Shore Drive, Chicago, Illinois 60611,
Fax 312-266-2042, phone 312-373-2314, E-mail address is
tcherkashina@playboy.com.

We look forward to hearing from you and resolving this matter
immediately.

This letter is not intended to and shall not waive or prejudice any
rights and remedies that Playboy may have at law, in equity or
otherwise. Any and all such rights and remedies are hereby expressly
reserved.



PLAYBOY ENTERPRISES INTERNATIONAL, INC.

Tatyana Cherkashina

Intellectual Property Assistant 

 

cc: Ana Cashman, Esq.
